description: This Dart file defines a FavoritesProvider class used for managing favorite recipe IDs within a Flutter application. It utilizes shared preferences for persistent storage and extends ChangeNotifier to notify UI components of state changes.

classes.name: FavoritesProvider
classes.description: A provider class managing favorite recipe IDs with persistent storage and change notification.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the provider by loading favorite IDs from shared preferences.

methods.name: isFavorite
methods.description: Checks if a given recipe ID is marked as favorite.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a recipe ID and updates persistent storage.

methods.name: favoriteIds
methods.description: Returns a list of current favorite recipe IDs.
